I will use the function get_top_rated_hotels_in_city(city="Paris") to retrieve a list of highly rated hotels.

I need to find the top-rated hotels in Paris. Since the function `get_top_rated_hotels_in_city` is not available, I will try to use a different approach. I can use the `search_hotels` function if it exists or gather more information about hotels in Paris using other functions.
